column1: Narrator : A smell of steel and iron floats in the air
Narrator : It’s a military camp, and a guard blocks the entrance

column2: Narrator : A soldier guarded the door, he is now dead
column4: OtherSpeak : How dare you step back in here

column6: OtherSpeak : Wait, you wouldn’t be CAPITAINE

OtherSpeak : What is all this noise !
OtherSpeak : Wow they killed our pal !
Narrator : The camp isn’t really big. A bonfire warms up the place and a few soldiers drink around it

column4: Choice : I wanna speak to your boss
